content: In the world of fashion, what Italian brand is known for its iconic interlocking G logo and luxury products ranging from clothing to accessories?

The Italian brand you're referring to is Gucci. Founded in Florence in 1921 by Guccio Gucci, Gucci has become synonymous with Italian luxury and craftsmanship. The interlocking G logo, known as the "double G," is one of the most recognizable symbols in the fashion industry. Gucci offers a wide range of products including clothing, shoes, handbags, watches, and accessories, all known for their high quality and distinctive design. Over the years, Gucci has evolved and expanded globally, maintaining its position as a leading luxury brand.
